R2RML-based Query Translation

• Query translation approaches applied for the implementation of query 
evaluation over RDB-backed triple stores can be extended to work with 
R2RML mappings
• R2RML-based query translation can be optimized, while preserving 
semantics, so that they can be applied in real-world cases
